exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "|-- fold_left ?prodp ys1 x --> x" in the current goal.
Found no subterm matching "|-- fold_left ?prodp ys2 x --> x" in the current goal.

original: intros x ys1 ys2 Hperm. unfold fold_left. rewrite (adjoint_iter x ys1 x). rewrite (adjoint_iter x ys2 x). rewrite (assoc_fold_left_fold_right_equiv ys1). rewrite (assoc_fold_left_fold_right_equiv ys2). rewrite Hperm. reflexivity.
